info.author: Sean Reifschneider
info.description:
filterinput is like fileinput but with a few changes to make it
easier to write filters.  It holds a few recent values like the
last line or last regex match to overcome Python's lack of assignment
in conditionals and to make filter code a little cleaner.
info.name: filterinput
info.summary: fileinput-like module with a strength for writing filters.
info.html_description: filterinput is like fileinput but with a few changes to make it easier to write filters. It holds a few recent values like the last line or last regex match to overcome Python’s lack of assignment in conditionals and to make filter code a little cleaner.
